thread.title: Get Visa On Arrival With No Embassy Visits At Visa-Vietnam.Org
thread.title_full: Get Visa On Arrival With No Embassy Visits At Visa-Vietnam.Org

author: prbuzz.com
title: Get Visa On Arrival With No Embassy Visits At Visa-Vietnam.Org
text:
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam (prbuzz) September 29, 2015 - Visa-Vietnam.org has been offering Vietnam visa services to its clients for the past 10 years. The Visa on Arrival services are of great demand as it is more convenient, but it is important that clients choose the right visa agent.
In order to get Vietnam visa on arrival or landing visa, applicants have to fill up an online application form on Visa-Vietnam’s website and pay the Visa fees and service charges through online bank transfer. Get visa approval letter through email, print a copy to show on boarding & get Visa on arrival. Finally, get the visa stamped at Vietnam airport.
Visa-Vietnam.org allows corporate members to avail 26% discount on service fees whereas, frequent members can avail 18% to 22% discount. “These special discounts and Visa On Arrival services have brought us many new clients and we’ve received 8.9 stars out of 10 on Trustpilot. Most of the Visa Vietnam reviews are based on our fast and efficient services,” says the manager from Visa-Vietnam.Org.
“For many years, we are using the service of Visa-Vietnam.org. They are very fast, efficient and worth the money. The normal service is already good, but the emergency service is lightning fast,” reviews a happy client.
Adding to the review, the manager comments, “We are happy to receive such accolades from our clients. It shows that our dedication is worthy and customer friendly. We work hard to maintain our friendly services and offer more affordable as well as fast service. ”
Rush service is also available which provides visa on same day or few hours with extra fees. They guarantee 100% satisfaction to the customers or would refund the money.
About Visa-Vietnam
Visa-Vietnam is one of the most reputed travel agents in Vietnam who can help to easily secure a Visa on Arrival. They offer special discounts, hassle free application process, processing within 24 hours, affordable prices and easy accessibility. To know more, visit https://www.visa-vietnam.org/
